update.description:
Depends on pull request #154

Added ogre2 implementation of RenderPass and GaussianNoisePass. Also added API to enable/disable render passes.

Updated `ogre2_demo` to demonstrate this feature. Press `p` to toggle the Gaussian noise render pass on and off. Here’s a screenshot of the demo with the Gaussian noise render pass enabled:

![](https://bitbucket.org/repo/zq9ear/images/780767410-gaussian_noise_ogre2_updated.png)
‌

To run ogre2 tests:

```
RENDER_ENGINE_VALUES=ogre2 make test
```
update.title: Add Ogre2 Gaussian noise render pass

pullrequest.title: Add Ogre2 Gaussian noise render pass

content.raw:
I managed to reproduce this on a different machine. The compositor script changes in [620c45e](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-rendering/commits/620c45e0cf61468b99af337c1fa1e92775fd1f4d) fixed the problem for me. Could you give that a try? 

I’m not sure what the reason is but the only difference I see is that the new machine has a better nvidia graphics card but they’re both using same driver version. I may have to look in ogre code for clues.
content.html:
I managed to reproduce this on a different machine. The compositor script changes in 620c45e fixed the problem for me. Could you give that a try?

I’m not sure what the reason is but the only difference I see is that the new machine has a better nvidia graphics card but they’re both using same driver version. I may have to look in ogre code for clues.

I did a fresh install, and restarted my PC. Press `p` does add more noise...

The following might be a problem with my machine. Here is what I see when I run the ogre2_demo.

I did a fresh install, and restarted my PC. Press p does add more noise...

pullrequest.title: Add Ogre2 Gaussian noise render pass

content.raw:
For your awareness. The `\class` line needs to be the following when wrapping lines:

```
    /** \class Ogre2GaussianNoisePass Ogre2GaussianNoisePass.hh \
     * ignition/rendering/ogre2/Ogre2GaussianNoisePass.hh
    */
```
content.html:
For your awareness. The \class line needs to be the following when wrapping lines:

    /** \class Ogre2GaussianNoisePass Ogre2GaussianNoisePass.hh \
     * ignition/rendering/ogre2/Ogre2GaussianNoisePass.hh
    */
